summary: REQ-1/REQ-2 appear implemented via new SectionHeader component and updated Selects/Experience section layouts, card styling, and hover behaviors using existing Tailwind tokens. REQ-3 is implemented by rendering concise uppercase category labels via `displayCategory` fields. REQ-4 is partially implemented: images are wired into content and rendered as clickable links opening in a new tab with `rel="noopener noreferrer"`, but the diff summary does not show the actual image assets being added, so reliable production rendering and exact image matching cannot be verified.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the same images shown in Aurient.aiâ€™s Selects and Experience sections to the corresponding items in this app, and ensure all images render reliably in production builds (no broken images).
missing_requirements.reason: The content now references image paths under `/assets/aurient/...`, and UI renders them, but the diff summary does not include any added image files (e.g., in `frontend/public/assets/...` or similar). Without the actual assets present, the 'same images' and 'no broken images in production builds' acceptance criteria cannot be confirmed from the diff.
